data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Third Quarter / Nine Months Ended 31.12.2022.
data.news_body: Dear Sir(s)/Madam(s),With reference to above, in continuation to our letter dated 24.01.2023 and pursuant to Regulation 30, 33 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015: We enclose herewith the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company, at their respective meetings held today along with the audit report(s) issued by the statutory auditors of the Company M/s. Price Waterhouse & Co., Chartered Accountants LLP;

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 05.08.2022
data.news_body:
With reference to above, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors in their aforesaid meeting has inter-alia:
a) Approved Audited Financial results of the company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the first quarter ended June 30, 2022.
Price Waterhouse & Co. Chartered Accountants LLP, the Statutory Auditors of the Company have issued auditors' reports
with an unmodified opinion on the Financial Results of the Company for the first quarter ended June 30, 2022.
b) Approved expansion of VBoards division at Midnapur district West Bengal by setting up a new unit with a capacity of 72000
TPA.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On  09.05.2022
data.news_body:
a) Approved Audited Financial results of the company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the fourth quarter / year
ended March 31, 2022.
b) Recommended final dividend of Rs .8/- per share (i. e., 80%) on equity share of Rs .10/- each fully paid-up for the
year ended 31.03.2022,
c) Book Cl osure : Pursuant to Regulation 42 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, approved the closure of the Register of Members and Share Transfer Books from , 30.05.2022 to 03.06..2022 for taking record of the Members of
the Company for the purpose of payment of dividend and the AGM for the financial year ended 31.03.2022.
d) The Board, based on the recommendation of the Audit
Committee, has re-appointed Price Waterhouse & Co Chartered Accountants LLP (Registration No. FRN
304026E/E300009), Chartered Accountants, as the statutory auditors of the Company for a second term of 5
years.

data.caption: Results - Audited Financial Results For March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
a) Approved Audited Financial results of the company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the fourth quarter / year
ended March 31, 2022.
b) Recommended final dividend of Rs .8/- per share (i. e., 80%) on equity share of Rs .10/- each fully paid-up for the
year ended 31.03.2022,
c) Book Cl osure : Pursuant to Regulation 42 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, approved the closure of the Register of Members and Share Transfer Books from , 30.05.2022 to 03.06..2022 for taking record of the Members of
the Company for the purpose of payment of dividend and the AGM for the financial year ended 31.03.2022.
d) The Board, based on the recommendation of the Audit
Committee, has re-appointed Price Waterhouse & Co Chartered Accountants LLP (Registration No. FRN
304026E/E300009), Chartered Accountants, as the statutory auditors of the Company for a second term of 5
years.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 04.02.2022 And Audited Financial Results Of The Company (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Third Quarter And  Nine Months Period Ended December 31, 2021
data.news_body:
In compliance with the Regulation 33 and 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 we are enclosing here with Audited Financial Results of the company (standalone and consolidated) for the Third quarter and Nine months period ended December 31, 2021, which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of the Company at their respective meetings held today.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 11.30 Hrs and concluded at Hrs.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: With reference to the earnings con-call scheduled on November 12, 2021, please find enclosed herewith presentation covering highlights of audited financial results of the company for the quarter ended September 30, 2021

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 30.10.2021 And Audited Financial Results For The Second Quarter / Half Year Ended 30.09.2021
data.news_body:
(a) The Board of Directors in their aforesaid meeting has inter-alia, approved audited financial results of the company (standalone and consolidated) for the second quarter / half year ended September 30, 2021, as reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board together with cash flow statement for the half year ended September 30, 2021 and statement of assets and liabilities as at September 30, 2021;

(b) The Auditor has expressed an unmodified opinion(s) on the audited financial results of the company (standalone and consolidated) for the second quarter / half year ended September 30, 2021.

(c) Appointed Mr. M.Muralidhar as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company effective from November 1, 2021. His profile as required under CIR/CFD/CMD/4/2015 is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
(a) The Board of Directors in the meeting held on 30.10.2021 has inter-alia, approved audited financial results of the company (standalone and consolidated) for the 2nd quarter / half year ended 30.09.2021, as reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee together with cash flow statement and statement of assets and liabilities as at 30.09.2021;

(b) The Auditor has expressed an unmodified opinion(s) on the audited financial results of the company (standalone and consolidated) for the 2nd quarter / half year ended 30.09.2021.

(c) Appointed Mr. M.Muralidhar as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company effective from 01.11.2021.

(d) With regard to the new Vnext Boards unit in Udumalpet, Tirpur District, Tamilnadu, commercial production is expected to commence in December 2021.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Further to our letter Ref: VIL/SEC/ST-EX/Con-Call/2021-22/21 Date:29.07.2021, in connection with the earnings con-call scheduled on July 30, 2021, please find enclosed herewith presentation covering highlights of audited financial results of the company for the quarter ended June 30, 2021.

This is for your information and records please.


Encl.: Presentation

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For 30.06.2021
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors in their meeting has inter-alia:
a) Approved AFR of the company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the first quarter ended 30.06.2021, as reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee of the Board.
(Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015, we enclose Statement showing the Audited Financial Results (standalone and consolidated) for the first quarter ended 30.06.2021 along with the Auditors' Report thereon.)

b) In terms of Regulations 30(4) and 30(5) of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015 Smt. G. Saroja Vivekanand, MD, Shri. G. Vamsi Krishna, JMD, and Shri S.Shafiulla, CFO of the Company are authorised to determine the materiality of event / information for making disclosures to Stock Exchanges from time to time.

We further state that the Auditor has expressed an unmodified opinion(s) on the audited financial results of the company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30.06.2021.

data.caption: Related Party Transactions For Half Year Ended 31.03.2021
data.news_body:
We enclose, in terms of Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, statement on related party transactions of the Company for the half year ended March 31, 2021 in the required format.

This is for your information and records please.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For 31.03.2021
data.news_body:
we wish to inform you that the Board in its meeting has inter-alia:
a) Approved AFR of the company (Standalone & Consolidated) for the 4th quarter / year ended 31.03.2021
b) Recommended final dividend of Rs.10/- per share subject to the approval of Shareholders in the ensuing 39th AGM of the Company scheduled to be held on, May 25, 2021;
c) Approved to close Register of members of the Company from May 20, 2021 to May 25, 2021 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of 39th (AGM) of the Company & payment of Dividend;
d) The aforesaid dividend, if approved by the Shareholders at the ensuing 39th AGM of the Company, will be paid to those members whose names appear in the Register of Members of the Company as on May 21, 2021;
e) Approved expansion of AC division at Raebareli unit by setting up additional line with a capacity of 1.00 lakh TPA;
f) Approved appointment of Shri. J.P.Rao, Whole-time Director of the Company
g) Dr. G. Vivekanand, Vice Chairman has been appointed as Chairman.
